attributes.action: British Government to Carry out A Full Public Inquiry & Investigation Against Cleveland Police Authority
attributes.additional_details: Numerous Attempted Murders of Little Children & Defenseless Adults-The- Standing-Family- by Cleveland Police Authority & Their Criminal Associates- DRUG DEALERS & Pedophiles. 3 Generations of Our Family including little children continue to be denied our Human Rights,Legal Rights & Rights to Justice By the British government-Home Office-Judicial Office & Ministry of Justice in the U.K- for 11 Years Plus.

rejection.details: The petition description is not clear on what action is requested.
